nodes.text: Vertseth was the planetary homeworld of Vertseth Automata, a droid manufacturing company that produced techno-service droids. One such droid was named Todo 360 and operated under the bounty hunter Cad Bane during the Clone Wars.

Vertseth was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars Character Encyclopedia, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2010. It was confirmed to be canon by a mention in the Encyclopedia entry for Todo 360.
